articles.author: Asian Aviation
articles.title: Airbus tipped to build space weather spacecraft Vigil - Asian Aviation
articles.description: Airbus has been selected by the European Space Agency (ESA) to design and build the space weather forecasting satellite Vigil
articles.content: Airbus has been selected by the European Space Agency (ESA) to design and build the space weather forecasting satellite Vigil, the first operational mission in ESAs Space Situational Awareness (SSA) … [+4103 chars]

articles.author: Daniel Lawler, Pierre Celerier
articles.title: Euclid space telescope unveils new images of the cosmos - Phys.org
articles.description: A mind-boggling number of shining galaxies, a purple and orange star nursery and a spiral galaxy similar to our Milky Way: new images were revealed from Europe's Euclid space telescope on Thursday.
articles.content:
A mind-boggling number of shining galaxies, a purple and orange star nursery and a spiral galaxy similar to our Milky Way: new images were revealed from Europe's Euclid space telescope on Thursday.
